author: NASS
description:
I colorized, restored, and created the sound design for this rare 1930s Kansas City , which offers an exceptional historical glimpse into the daily life of a well-off Black family during an era marked by segregation, economic recovery after the Great Depression, and the cultural vibrancy that defined many African American communities in Midwestern cities. This film not only preserves an intimate family moment but also highlights a rarely documented perspective of Black middle-class life in the early 20th century.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.


Join this channel to benefit
title: Kansas City 1930s in color [60fps, Remastered] w/sound design added
